inclusion.criterion: Able to swallow and retain oral medication
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to read and write (IPSS questionnaire is self-administered)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Understand instructions related to study procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in an investigational or marketed drug trial within the 30 days prior to the first dose of study drug
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with a history of acute urinary retention. He has a large prostate and bladder issues, but his recent blood chemistry was normal.
